I ordered these (Desert Sand) assuming that they would be a very light tan color, but they came the same colors as the others we ordered (Desert Sand V1).... which I apparently mistakenly assumed would be a different color because the colors are significantly different in the photos online, and they come at different price points.  So the pants are great, but I'm very dissatisfied with the color of the pants.  If you try to order these, you'll get ones that look like the other khaki pants instead.

I bought these in a 38 waist because I wanted to be able to wear thin long johns under them, and they don't even fit with regular underwear.  I tried on a pair of Dickies shorts at a local store in 40 waist, and they fit perfect, so that means I'd have to get at least a 42 to fit long johns under them.  In every other brand of pants I own, I wear a 36 waist and they're still slightly loose.  With DIckies, it's the wrong waist size and a WASTE of money.  Too bad it's too late to return them.

评论概述: Perfect pants for work or play
评论详情: Perfection. The perfect pants for work or play.  The surprising part is no one is successfully copying this Dickies style for design, cut, proportions, pickets, or material. So Dickies owns this market completely, except there are a few others at 2-3X the cost that can't be purchased on Amazon (so good luck with sizing and returns with those companies).  65% poly and 35% cotton, which is fine. Limits shrinkage (almost none), extends durability, keeps them lightweight, wash any way you want to without penalties, etc.  This is the standard so others should copy it, but Dickies pricing is very competitive anyway so people would likely still choose Dickies.

Pros: Well made, don't wrinkle excessively, look nice. Sufficient belt loops, which is becoming a rarity.  Cons: a bit thin, but it's late fall in N Florida, and it's chilly (at least for natives) here. Button waist, and it's a tight fit. They're new, though, and they'll only get looser, not tighter.  Overall great value, but I caught them deeply discounted. If I see that price again, I'll get enough to dress my great grandchildren one day. I didn't know they'd be this nice.
